Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class InitialConnector

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.InitialConnector
public class InitialConnector extends Object
This class is used to initialize the connection between the client and the server It manages the coordination between the sender and receiver classes, and holds the shared resources between the two

  • Constructor Details

    • InitialConnector

      public InitialConnector(String hostname, int portNumber)

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      After a network error, this method resets the network components of the client to get ready for a new connection

    • login

      public boolean login(String nickname)
      Connects to a Server with the already present hostname and port, and sends the user nickname via private methods
      Parameters:
      nickname - a nickname chosen by the user to be used during the game
      Returns:
      true if the login was successful and it was possible to connect to a server, false otherwise. In case of failure, the connection must be reset

    • startReceiving

      public void startReceiving()
      Starts the routine to parse incoming (synch) messages

    • connect

      private Socket connect(String hostname, int port) throws ConnectionFailedException
      Establishes a connection to a Server
      Parameters:
      hostname - the host ip address
      port - the host's port to connect to
      Returns:
      The client's side socket of the established connection if successful
      Throws:
      ConnectionFailedException - Contains a message error if the connection was unsuccessful

    • notifyNetworkError

      public void notifyNetworkError(String error)
      This will be called by either the sender, the receiver or the initial connector itself and will cause this class to notify both of them to let them know the connection was lost in an unexpected manner
      It closes all open sockets

    • notifyApplicationQuit

      public void notifyApplicationQuit()
      Called by the sender, this method notifies all parts of the client application that the user wants to quit.
      It closes all connections and quits the application

    • loginSuccessful

      public void loginSuccessful(int idUser)
      Actions to take once the connection is established - Starts the ping routine - Sets the user id for all the network components that require it

    • setSender

      public void setSender(ClientSender sender)

    • setReceiver

      public void setReceiver(ClientReceiver receiver)

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()

    • getConnected

    • setCurrentIdRequest
